verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
To be in Your Presence
To sit at Your feet
Where Your love surrounds me
And makes me complete

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
This is my desire O Lord
This is my desire
This is my desire O Lord
This is my desire

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
To rest in Your presence
Not rushing away
To cherish each Moment
Here I would stay
